graphs
Class Histogram

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  edu.uah.math.devices.Graph
                      graphs.Histogram
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class Histogram
extends Graph

This class extends the Graph class published by the University of Alabama in Huntsville to graph histogram data. All of the members are public, so be careful how you manipulate them.

Author:
Ian Terrell
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

Histogram

public Histogram(int width,
                 int height,
                 double xMin,
                 double xMax,
                 int numBins)
Constructs a histogram with the given parameters.

Parameters:
width - the width of the histogram
height - the height of the histogram
xMin - the min x value to graph
xMax - The max x value to graph
numBins - The number of bins of the histogram

public void paintComponent(java.awt.Graphics g)
